Description: Baseline energy mix for Europe in 2018, representing current renewable and fossil fuel shares.
Projected energy mix in 2030 with increased renewable penetration and gradual fossil phase-out.
Energy mix projection for 2040, showing further decarbonisation and clean energy uptake.
Long-term scenario for 2050 focusing on near-zero emissions with high renewables share.
Sector-specific scenario for chemicals and steel aiming for net-zero emissions by 2050.
Electrification pathway based on EU-MIX-2050, emphasising electric energy use in industry.
